DOC.brief_summary: To study safety efficacy CD20 antibody usage follow CIK transfusion refractory and/or chemoresistant lymphoma .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment CD20 Antibody Plus CIK Patients With Refractory Lymphomas
DOC.detailed_description: Autologous CIK transfusion within 3 day post CD20 antibody treatment .
DOC.criteria: diagnose Bcell lymphoma CD20 positiveness , need therapy refuse therapy need tolerate therapy
